title: Vasili's garden
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Greeks - Australia
abstract: A gardening show with a personal touch
description: Welcome to Vasili's Garden, a fun and very organic gardening show with lots of entertainment. Vasili enters people's lives via the garden gate and together with the garden's creator he delves into the private world beyond the backyard fence exploring their gardening obsessions and fantasies, sharing their tips and common sense. A tour around everyday gardens presented in both Greek and English with helpful tips and advice.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001092; Channel 31 content for Memory Grid: TV50 special feature; Active; Sep 2007
